verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7200>"See,<s%> I <S%H5414>make<s%> you [as] <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be your <S%H5030>prophet.<s%>

"You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, and your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that he <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> out of his <S%H776>land.<s%>
"But I will <S%H7185>harden<s%> Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> that I may <S%H7235>multiply<s%> My <S%H226>signs<s%> and My <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

"When <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you, then I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> out My <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>

"And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when I <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out My <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from their <S%H8432>midst.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> [it;] as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H3651>thus<s%> they <S%H6213>did.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H8084>eighty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> eighty-three, when they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>'Work<s%> a <S%H4159>miracle,<s%>' then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>'Take<s%> your <S%H4294>staff<s%> and <S%H7993>throw<s%> [it] <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> [that] it may <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>'"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3651>thus<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> his <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H7993>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H8577>serpent.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for [the] <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> and [the] <S%H3784>sorcerers,<s%> and they <S%H1571>also,<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with their <S%H3909>secret<s%> <S%H3909>arts.<s%>

For <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H7993>threw<s%> <S%H7993>down<s%> his <S%H4294>staff<s%> and they <S%H1961>turned<s%> into <S%H8577>serpents.<s%> But Aaron's <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up their <S%H4294>staffs.<s%>
Yet Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3515>stubborn;<s%> he <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> as he is <S%H3318>going<s%> out to the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5324>station<s%> <S%H5324>yourself<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him on the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile;<s%> and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> that was <S%H2015>turned<s%> into a <S%H5175>serpent.<s%>

"And you will <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'The <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> But <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3541>now.<s%> "

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "By <S%H2088>this<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> that is in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> with the <S%H4294>staff<s%> that is in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and it shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

"And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that are in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H4191>die,<s%> and the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H887>become<s%> <S%H887>foul;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> will <S%H3811>find<s%> <S%H3811>difficulty<s%> in <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>"' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>'Take<s%> your <S%H4294>staff<s%> and <S%H5186>stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H2975>streams,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> their <S%H98>pools,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H9288>reservoirs<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> that they may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood;<s%> and there shall be <S%H1818>blood<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both in [vessels of] <S%H6086>wood<s%> and in [vessels of] <S%H68>stone.<s%>'"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>even<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded.<s%> And he <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up the <S%H4294>staff<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> that [was] in the <S%H2975>Nile,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> that [was] in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> was <S%H2015>turned<s%> to <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And the <S%H1710>fish<s%> that [were] in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> <S%H887>became<s%> <S%H887>foul,<s%> so that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%> And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> was through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

But the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with their <S%H3909>secret<s%> <S%H3909>arts;<s%> and Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>
Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7896>concern<s%> <S%H3820><s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> for <S%H2088>this.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2658>dug<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> for <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> for they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4390>passed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>
